comment: GAB seems to be a a bit like the wild wild west with mud roads and rain-filled gullys; where barking women and brawlers can accost you as you try to navigate across the first street. I loved my known Twitter neighborhood. but I can make it here!
amr:
# ::snt GAB seems to be a a bit like the wild wild west with mud roads and rain-filled gullys; where barking women and brawlers can accost you as you try to navigate across the first street. I loved my known Twitter neighborhood. but I can make it here!
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / seem-01
            :ARG1 (l / local-region
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "GAB")
                  :ARG1-of (r / resemble-01
                        :ARG2 (l2 / local-region
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "wild"
                                    :op2 "wild"
                                    :op3 "West")
                              :ARG0-of (h / have-03
                                    :ARG1 (a / and
                                          :op1 (r2 / road
                                                :mod (m2 / mud))
                                          :op2 (g / gully
                                                :ARG1-of (f / fill-01
                                                      :ARG2 (r3 / rain-01))))))
                        :degree (b / bit))))
      :snt2 (p / possible-01
            :ARG1 (a2 / accost-01
                  :ARG0 (a3 / and
                        :op1 (w / woman
                              :ARG0-of (b2 / bark-01))
                        :op2 (b3 / brawler))
                  :ARG1 (y / you)
                  :time (t / try-01
                        :ARG0 y
                        :ARG1 (n3 / navigate-01
                              :ARG0 y
                              :ARG1 (a4 / across
                                    :op1 (s2 / street
                                          :ord (o / ordinal-entity
                                                :value 1)))))))
      :snt3 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (l3 / love-01
                  :ARG0 (ii / i)
                  :ARG1 (n4 / neighborhood
                        :ARG1-of (k / know-02)
                        :poss ii
                        :location (p2 / publication
                              :name (n5 / name
                                    :op1 "Twitter"))))
            :ARG2 (p3 / possible-01
                  :ARG1 (m3 / make-it-14
                        :ARG0 ii
                        :ARG1 n4))))

comment: Please refrain from using hateful homophobic language in your posts.  It adds nothing of value to the conversation.
